author: clearlight1596
content:
Hello everyone. My name is Lailton from brazil. I am so interested on ERC protocol such as ERC20, ERC721, ERC1155 and I have studied go-ethereum core code to find how ERC protocols are implemented. But I didn't find with my ability.
So I am here to get help from experts. Please help me.

author: djrtwo
content: ERC token standards are written in some contract language (often solidity) and compiled to EVM bytecode. geth and other clients allow for running of EVM bytecode but does not concern itself with particular contracts or constructions

author: clearlight1596
content:
<@!291925846556540928>  Thank you. What i want to know is where ERC721 code is implemented in Ethereum network. For example go-ethereum core code or smart contract? 
And can i change it?
